title: Best of The Program |  Guests: Mark Meckler & Marlena Pavlos-Hackney | 4/1/21
description:
Pat Gray stops by with the latest crazy developments in the Matt Gaetz investigation, as both sides claim to have worked with the FBI. Why are so many big companies standing against Georgia’s new voting laws? Glenn gives us the decoder ring to understand what’s really going on — and it all revolves around the Great Reset. Restaurant owner Marlena Pavlos-Hackney returns to discuss being jailed for refusing to close down under COVID restrictions.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
